Key Match Events: Stephen Curry scored the final 12 points for the Warriors to will them to a 120-117 victory over Klay Thompson and the Dallas Mavericks at Chase Center on Tuesday.
Stephen Curry scored a season-high 37 points and made a 28-foot step-back 3-pointer with 27.5 seconds left, giving the Warriors a four-point lead.
Post-Match Reflections: Klay Thompson said, 'It was fun to match up with Steph,' but 'it hurts to be on the other side of one of his flurries. The guy got hot at the end and made some ridiculous shots and being on the other end, it sucks.'
